src: Manana voalavo 4-bolana izao izahay izay tsy voan’ny diabeta kanefa nararin’ny diabeta teo aloha, hoy izy.
mt: 4-week-old baby who was not diabetic but was diabetic before, says he.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr.Ehud Ur, Profesora ao amin’ny sampam-pampianarana mpitsabo any Dalhousie, Oniversite an’I Halifax, Nova Scotia ary filohan’ny sampana klinika sy mpikaroka ao amin’ny fikambanana diabeta kanadiana dia nampitandrina fa mbola eo am-piandohana ny fikarohana.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor at Dalhousie University's School of Medicine, Halifax, Nova Scotia and head of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical practice group, said the research is still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Tahaka ny manampahaizana sasany hafa, misalasala ihany izy ny amin’ny hoe afaka sitranina ve ny diabeta sa tsia, manamarika fa tsy misy mitombina amin’ny olona izay efa tratran’ny diabeta Karazany 1 ireo vokapikarohana ireo.
mt: As with other studies, he emphasized that the study did not prove that the drug was safe for people who already had diabetes, but rather that it was safe for people who were at risk of developing diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Nanambara ampahibemaso tamin’ny alatsinainy teo, nandritra ny fandaharana iray tao amin’ny onjampeo Sveriges Radio tao Soeda, i Sara Danius, mpitantsoratry ny Kaomitin'ny Nobel momba ny Haisoratra, fa ny kaomity, izay tsy nahazo an’i Boby Dylan mivantana mba hilaza aminy fa nahazo ny Fankasitrahana Nobel 2016 ho an’ny Haisoratra izy, dia nanatsahatra ireo ezaka natao hiresahana aminy.
mt: In a statement to Swedish radio, Sara Danius, chair of the Swedish Academy, said the committee, which did not invite Dylan to explain why he declined the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, was surprised by the decision.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Hoy Danius, ”Tsy manao na inona na inona izahay amin’izao. Niantso sy nandefa mailaka tamin’ny mpiaramiasa akaiky aminy aho ary nahazo valiny feno fitiavana be. Hatreto, ampy angamba izay.“
mt: “I don’t know what happened. I was hit and knocked down by the other car and got a broken leg. I was lucky,” he said.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Teo aloha teo, ny Filoha Tale Jeneralin'ny Ring, Jamie Siminoff, dia nanamarika fa teraka ilay orinasa rehefa tsy reny avy tao amin’ny fivarotany tao amin'ny garaziny ny lakolosim-baravarany.
mt: Earlier this year, CEO Tale General of the Ring, Jamie Siminoff, announced that the company was born after the garage of the invention of the car.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Izy dia nanamboatra lakolosim-baravarana misy WiFi, hoy izy.
mt: He said he built a Wi-Fi-enabled flying saucer.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Nilaza i Siminoff fa niakatra ny varotra taorian’ny fisehoany tanatina fizarana Shark Tank iray tamin’ny 2013 izay nandavan’ny vaomieran’ny fandaharana ny hamatsy vola an’ilay orinasa vao misandratra.
mt: Siminoff said the company’s sales took off after an appearance on the 2013 season of Shark Tank, where the company’s product was pitched to investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Tamin’ny faramparan’ny taona 2017 dia niseho tamin’ny fandaharam-barotra an-televiziona QVC i Siminofa.
mt: 2017 saw the debut of Siminofa on the home shopping network QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Nametraka fitoriana tamin’ny orinasa fiambenana mpifanandrina ihany koa i Ring, ny orinasa ADT Corporation.
mt: The company also said it was working with ADT Corp.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Raha efa misy vaksiny andrana iray izay afaka mampidina ny taham-pahafatesana avy amin’ny Ebola, dia tsy mbola misy kosa, hatramin’izao, ny fanafody izay voaporofo mazava fa mety amin’ny fitsaboana ny aretina efa miseho.
mt: If there is already a vaccine that can prevent Ebola deaths, there is not yet, at least until now, a treatment that is proven to be effective in treating the disease in humans.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Nampisy fanantenana teny ifotony tany am-boalohany ny fangaron-kery fiarovana iray, ZMapp, saingy nampiseho ny fikarohana ara-drafitra fa kely kokoa noho ny notadiavina ho fisorohana ny fahafatesana ny tombontsoa azo aminy.
mt: A clinical trial of one experimental drug, ZMapp, was halted after preliminary data showed it was ineffective at saving lives.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Tamin’ny andrana PALM, ny ZMapp dia nampiasaina ho fanarahamaso, izay midika fa nampiasain’ny manampahaizana ho fototra iaingana izy io ary nampitahain'izy ireo taminy ireo fitsaboana telo hafa.
mt: During the PALM, ZMapp was used as a treatment, meaning it was administered to patients who had been infected with the virus and were in serious condition.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Ny USA Gymnastics dia manohana ny taratasin’ny Kaomity Amerikanina misahana ny Lalao Olaimpika ary manaiky ny filàna maika ho an’ny fianakaviana Olaimpika mba hampiroborobo tontolo azo antoka ho an’ny atletantsika rehetra.
mt: The USA Gymnastics is seeking the American Olympic Committee's approval to change the age limit for the Olympic family to allow all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Miombon-kevitra amin'ny fanambaran'ny USOC izahay fa ny tombotsoan’ny atletantsika sy ny vondrona, sy ny fanatanjahantenan'izy ireo, dia tsaratsara kokoa raha mandroso miaraka amin’ny fiovana manan-danja ao anatin’ny fikambanantsika, fa tsy ny fanafoanana ny fankatoavana.
mt: The USOC is considering whether the athletes, teams and their support staffs, are better served by the changes in the federation, rather than the availability of the federation.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Ny USA Gymnastics dia manohana famotorana mahaleo tena izay mety hampivoaka ny resaka fanararaotana faritan’ireo tavela tamin’ny Larry Nassar, izay mety tsy noresahina,ka mety hitondra fiovana.
mt: The USA Gymnastics is seeking a permanent ban for athletes who fail to report sexual abuse by Larry Nassar, who may not have been reported, and may lead to changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Mitovy ny tanjon’ny USA Gymnastics sy ny USCO - ny hahatonga ny fanatanjahantena zimnastika sy ny hafa toy izany ho azo antoka arak’izay azo atao mba hahafahan’ireo atleta hanatanteraka ny nofinofiny ao amina toerana azo antoka, miabo ary mahaleo tena.
mt: The USA Gymnastics and USOC have taken steps to prevent future abuse of gymnasts and others like it from occurring, allowing athletes to compete in safe environments.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Nandritry ny taona 60, I Brzezinski dia niasa ho mpanolotsaina an’i Jaona F. Kennedy ary avy eo ho an’ny fitondrana Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 60 years old, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and then to the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Nanolo-tsaina an'i Carter momba ny politika ivelany izy nandritra ny fifantenana izay natao tamin’ny taona 1976, ary avy eo niasa ho Mpanolotsaina ny Fiarovam-pirenena (NSA) tamin’ny taona 1977 hatramin’ny 1981, nandimby an’i Henry Kissinger.
mt: Carter was asked about his foreign policy during the interview, which took place in 1976, and later served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Tamin’ny naha NSA azy dia nanampy an’i Carter tamin’ny fifandraisana ara-diplaomatika eran-tany izy, toy ny Fifanarahana tao Camp David, 1978 ; ny fandaminana ny fifandraisan'i Etazonia-Sina tamin’ny faramparan’ny 1970 ; ny Tolom-piavotana iranianina, izay nitondra tamin’ny krizin’ny takalonaina tany Iran, 1979; ary ny fanafihan’ny Sôvietika an’i Afhanistan, 1979.
mt: As NSA, he advised Carter on foreign policy matters, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; the normalization of U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Hostage Crisis, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ilay sarimihetsika, misy an’i Ryan Gosling sy i Emma Stone, dia voatendry tanatin’ny sokajy lehibe rehetra.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, is being released in all major markets.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Nahazo fanendrena ho mpilalao sarimihetsika lahy sy vavy tsara indrindra i Gosling sy i Stone.
mt: Gosling and Stone were named best actor and actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Ny fanendrena hafa dia ahitana ny Horonantsary tsara indrindra, Mpanatontosa, Fanatanterahana horonantsary, Fanamboarana ny akanjo fentina an-tsehatra, Fanambarana horonantsary, Partition originale, Famokarana, Fikirakirana ny lafin’ny feo, Fanambarana ny feo rehetra, Rindrantsehatra Orizinaly.
mt: 1. The best military, 2. The Army, 3. The Army, 4. The Army, 5. The Army, 6. The Army, 7. The Army, 8. The Army, 9. The Army, 10. The Army, 11. The Army, 12. The Army, 13. The Army, 14. The Army, 15. The Army, 16. The Army, 17. The Army, 18. The Army, 19. The Army, 20. The Army, 21. The Army, 22. The Army, 23. The Army, 24. The Army, 25. The Army, 26. The Army, 27. The Army, 28. The Army, 29. The Army, 30. The Army, 31. The Army, 32. The Army, 33. The Army, 34. The Army, 35. The Army, 36. The Army, 37. The Army, 38. The Army, 39. The Army, 40. The Army, 41. The Army, 42. The Army, 43. The Army, 44. The Army, 45. The Army, 46. The Army, 47. The Army, 48. The Army, 49. The Army, 50. The Army, 51. The Army, 52. The Army, 53. The Army, 54. The Army, 55. The Army, 56. The Army, 57. The Army, 58. The Army, 59. The Army, 60. The Army, 61. The Army, 62. The Army, 63. The Army, 64. The Army, 65. The Army, 66. The Army, 67. The Army, 68. The Army, 69. The Army, 70. The Army, 71. The Army, 72. The Army, 73. The Army, 74. The Army, 75. The Army, 76. The Army, 77. The Army, 78. The Army, 79. The Army, 80. The Army, 81. The Army, 82. The Army, 83. The Army, 84. The Army, 85. The Army, 86
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Hira roa avy amin’ilay horonantsary, (Ireo Adala Manonofy) sy tanànan’ireo kintana, no voatendry ho hira orizinaly tsara indrindra. Ny trano famokarana Lionsgate dia nahazo fanendrena 26 – mihoatra noho ny trano famokarana hafa.
mt: 2 Lionsgate films, (The Hunger Games) and the cities of the districts, are the most original and best-selling books. Lionsgate’s production studio has been awarded 26 – more than other production studios.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Ny Sabotsy alina, dia nanambara ny filohan’ny Etazonia Donald Trump, tamin’ny alalan’ny lahateny izay nataon’ny sekretera mpampita vaovao, fa handao an’i Syria ny tafika amerikana.
mt: The Sabotsy alina, the United States President Donald Trump, announced the withdrawal of American troops from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Natao taorian’ny resaka an-tariby nifanaovan’i Trump sy ny filoham-pirenena tiorka Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ny fanambarana.
mt: The meeting came after a series of public spats between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Torkia dia handray ihany koa ny fiambenana ireo mpiady ISIS voasambotra, izay voalaza anatin’ny fanambarana, fa tsy ho apodin’ny firenena Eoropeanina an-tanindrazana.
mt: The group also claimed responsibility for the killing of ISIS fighters, which the statement said was not the responsibility of the group’s European parent.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Tsy vitan’ny hoe manamarina fotsiny ity fa nisy volony ny dinaozaoro sasany, izay teoria niparitaka efa ela, fa manome tsipiriany tsy hita amin’nyfosily, toy ny loko ary ny fandrefesana telo-miantoana.
mt: It is not clear whether the crash was caused by a technical fault, a theory that has been circulating for some time, or a pilot error, such as a stall or a spin.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Milaza ireo manampahaizana fa ny volon’ity biby ity dia miloko volontany ny lafiny ambony ary miloko matroka na volon-karaoty ny lafiny ambany.
mt: . Witnesses say the plane's nose was crushed and its tail was broken.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Manome fahalalàna bebe kokoa mahakasika ny fivoaranan’ny volom-borona ihany koa ity zavatra hita ity.
mt: This is also a good example of the importance of the proper use of the subjunctive.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Koa satria tsy manana tahony mivoatra tsara antsoina hoe rachis ny volon’ny dinôzôro saingy manana endrikà volo hafa tokoa — volombava sy barbules — nanao tsoakevitra ireo mpikaroka fa mety ho fivoarana taty aoriana ilay rachis raha oharina amin’ireo endrika hafa ireo.
mt: Although the dinosaur's tail is not well preserved, it does have other features — a club and spikes — that led researchers to believe that the tail was a weapon.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Ny firafitr’ireo volomborona dia ahafahana mieritreritra fa tsy nampiasaina hanidinana izy ireo fa hifehezana ny maripana na hisarihana vady. Ireo mpikaroka dia nandroso fa na dia rambona dinaozaoro tanora aza izy io dia volomborona matoy no hita tamin’ny santionan-tambatsela fa tsy ilay manify kely toy ny an’ny akohokely ireny.
mt: The bodies were identified as not being those of the pilots, but rather as those of two men who had been killed in a car accident. The bodies were found in a car that had been set on fire. The police said that the car was not the one used by the pilots, but rather a small car like the one used by the police.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Nandroso hevitra ireo mpikaroka fa na dia rambona dinaozaoro tanora aza izy io dia volomborona efa matoy no hita teo aminy fa tsy ilay malemy kely ohatra ny an’ny akohokely ireny.
mt: The researchers say that even if the device is as small as a grain of sand, it can be seen with a microscope, unlike the tiny particles of ink that make up the inkjet.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ilay fiara voasesika baomba nipoaka tao amin’ny foiben’ny polisy tany Gaziantep tao Torkia omaly maraina dia namono polisy anankiroa ary nandratra olona hafa mihoatra ny roapolo.
mt: 12 police officers were injured and 16 civilians were killed in a car bomb explosion in Gaziantep, Turkey on Monday.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Nilaza ny biraon’ny governora fa ny sivy ambin’ny folo amin’ireo maratra dia polisy.
mt: 12 of the 18 arrested were police.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Nilaza ny polisy fa miahiahy miaramilan’ny Daesh (ISIL) ho tomponandraikitra tamin’ny fanafihana izy ireo.
mt: Police said they were looking for Daesh (ISIL) sympathizers.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Hitan’izy ireo fa mitovy fiasa amin’ny kintana hafa ny Masoandro: ny hetsiky ny kintana ao amin’ny rafitra dia hita fa miankina amin’ny hazavany, ny fiodinanany ary izay ihany.
mt: They say that the moon is just like other planets: the craters are seen to be filled with lava, the volcanoes and the like.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Ny hazavana sy fihodinana dia nampiasaina miaraka mba hahafantarana ny tarehimarika Rossby an’ilay kintana, izay mifandray amin’ny fikorinan’ny tsiranoka.
mt: The study used computer simulations to examine the Rossby waves, which are related to the jet stream.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Arakaraka ny mahakely ny isan’i Rossby no tsy dia mampivadibadika ny hery maninton’ilay kintana.
mt: The Rossby number is a measure of the relative importance of the Coriolis force, which is responsible for the rotation of the Earth, and the inertial forces, which are responsible for the motion of the Earth.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Nandritra ny diany, dia nisedra olana imbetsaka i Iwasaki.
mt: During the interview, Iwasaki was asked about the company's plans to expand its business in the United States.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Norobain’ny jiolahintsambo izy, nokaikerin’ny alika romotra tany Tibet, nandositra fanambadiana tany Nepala ary voasambotra tany India.
mt: He was arrested by Chinese police, detained in Tibet, deported to Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Ny fenitra 802.11n dia mahakasika ny hatetika 2,4 Ghz sy 5,0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates in the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Hanampy azy hifanentana amin’ny 802.11a, 802.11b sy 802.11g izany, mila manana onjampeo roa kosa anefa ny toby fototra.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are supported, with two antennas per device.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Ireo hafainganam-pandehan’ny 802.11n dia haingana dia haingana kokoa noho ny an’ireo teo alohany miaraka amin’ny tosaka teorika farafahabeny 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n devices are also limited by the theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, izay manambady sy manan-janaka roa efa lehibe, dia tsy nanamarika be an'i Miller, izay nitantaraina ilay zava-niseho.
mt: Duvall, who has two grown children, said she was not aware of Miller's death, which was reported in the news.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Rehefa nangatahana fanehoankevitra i Miller dia hoy izy : “Be resaka be I Mike mandritra ny fakana am-bava… Mbola niomana aho ka tsy reko tsara izay nolazainy.”
mt: When asked about the incident, Miller said: “I’m not going to comment on Mike’s behavior at the dinner table… I’m not going to say anything bad about him.”
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Hoezahanay ahena amin’ny fomba misy varany ny famokarana eton’arina isaky ny harin-karena iray ny taona 2020, raha miala avy amin’ny tahany tamin’ny taona 2005”, hoy I Hu.
mt: “The country’s economy will be in a better position by 2020, if it continues to grow at the current rate of 5 percent per year,” said the IMF.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Tsy nametraka isa ho an’ny fanenàna izy, nilaza fa izany dia ho atao miankina amin’ny famokarana ara-toekarena sinoa.
mt: He did not give a figure for the project, but said it was part of China's efforts to help Africa.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Nampahery ny firenena an-dàlam-pandrosoana i Hu ”mba hiala amin’ny fomba fahiny izay mandoto aloha vao manadio avy eo.“
mt: The country’s top diplomat said the U.S. was “playing with fire” by threatening to cut off aid.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Nilaza koa izy hoe, na izany aza, dia tsy tokony hangatahina handray andraikitra mihoatra ny efa vitany sy ny fahaizany izy ireo.”
mt: “We also said that even if we were to be killed, we would not be able to do more than we have already done.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Ny Vondrona Mpandalina ny momba an'Iràka dia nanolotra ny tatitra androany tamin’ny 12.00 ora GMT.
mt: The Iraqi government has extended its state of emergency by another 30 days, starting at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Mampitandrina izy Tsy misy afaka manome antoka fa hampijanona ny adin’antoko, ny fitombon’ny herisetra na ny fikororohana mankany amin'ny savorovoro goavana izay hetsika atao ao Iràka amin’izao fotoana, na inona izany na inona.
mt: He is not allowed to give orders for the deployment of troops, the movement of tanks or the bombing of targets in Iraq, or whatever else he is doing.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Ilay Tatitra dia nosokafana tamina fiangaviana ny mba hisian’ny adihevitra misokatra sy ny fitadiavana marimaritra iraisana ao Etazonia mahakasika ny politika manoloana ny Afovoany Atsinanana.
mt: The crash comes as the U.S. Congress debates a bill that would allow the U.S. Navy to lease nuclear-powered submarines to Taiwan.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Manakiana mafy saika ny lafiny rehetra amin’ny politikan’ny Mpanatanteraka mihatra amin’i Iraka amin’izao ny tatitra ka mitaky fiovan’ny tantana izao dieny izao.
mt: The Iraqi government has been criticized for its slow response to the current crisis.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Voalohany amin’ireo sosokevitra 78 nataony ny fanapahan-kevitra vaovao ara-diplomatika izay tokony atao mialohan’ny faran’ity taona ity mba hiarovana ny sisintanin’Iràka amin’ny fidiran’ny fahavalo ary hamerenana indray ny fifandraisana ara-diplomatika amin’ireo mpifanolobodirindrina aminy.
mt: 78 countries have signed the new diplomatic framework agreement that will be finalized by the end of this year to address Iraq’s reconstruction and restore diplomatic relations with those who have boycotted it.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ny senatera ankehitriny sady Vadin'ny Filohan'i Arzantinina, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, dia nanambara fa hilatsaka ho filoham-pirenena izy, omaly hariva tao amin’ny La Plata, tanàndehibe 50 kilaometatra (31 miles) miala an’i Boenozera.
mt: The current president and wife of former Argentine president Nestor Kirchner, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, announced that she will run for president, possibly against former president Carlos Menem.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Nanao fanambarana tao amin’ny Argentine Theatre i Ramatoa Kirchner fa mikasa hilatsaka ho filoham-pirenenana izy, toerana nanombohany ny propangadiny voalohany tamin’ny taona 2005, rehefa izy nilatsaka ho anisan’ny delegasionin’ny province Buenos Aires.
mt: Ramón Kirchner, the son of former Argentine president Néstor Kirchner, closed the Argentine Theatre to the public, saying he was going to become a full-time politician, the first time he had done so since his father’s death in 2010.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Nateraky ny fifandirana momba ny fanampiana sy fanarenana taorian’ny fandalovan’ny rivodoza Katrina ilay adihevitra; izay nantsoin’ireo mpandala ny hetra tamin’ny fomba feno hanihany hoe “Fifanarahan’i Bush any Nouvelle-Orléans.”
mt: 2005 hurricane relief efforts were criticized; the plan was called “Bush’s New Orleans” by some.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Ny fanakianana malalaka ny ezaka fanarenana dia nifototra tamin’ilay fanomezana ny fifanarahana momba ny fanarenana ho an'ireo olona heverina fa mihazona tsiambaratelo momba an'i Washington.
mt: The lawsuit seeks damages from the agreement on housing for people believed to be homeless in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Mihoatra ny efatra tapitrisa ny olona nandeha tany Roma mba hanatrika ilay fandevenana.
mt: 4,000 people attended the event in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Betsaka loatra ny olona tonga ka tsy ny rehetra no nahavita niditra tao amin’ilay fandevenana tao amin'ny St. Peter’s Square.
mt: Many people came, but not all were able to fit into St. Peter’s Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Efijerina fahitalavitra lehibe maro no napetraka tamin’ny toerana samihafa tao Rôma mba hahafahan’ny olona mijery an’ilay lanonana.
mt: Large crowds gathered at various points in Rome to watch the event.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Tany amin’ny tànana maro tao Italia sy tany amin’ny toerana ambiny hafa teto amin’izao tontolo izao, indrindra tao Poland, dia nisy fitaovana mitovy amin’ireo napetraka, izay nojeren’ny olona maro an’isa.
mt: In many countries, including Italy and other parts of the world, especially Poland, there were demonstrations with the same slogans, which were attended by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Ny mpahay tantara dia nitsikera ny pôlitikan'ny FBI taloha noho izy nampifantoka ny enti-manana tamin’ireo raharaha mora vahana, indrindra fa ny raharaha fangalarana fiara, no sady te hampiakatra ny taham-pahombiazan’ny birao.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI for its handling of the investigation, particularly the handling of the crime scene, which they say compromised the integrity of the evidence.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Nanomboka namatsy vola ny hadalana ara-ketra 2005 ny Kongresy ary nanamarika fa ny FBI dia tsy maintsy manokana olona 10 ho an’ny pôrnôgrafian’olon-dehibe.
mt: 2005 budget hearings began in Congress and the FBI was required to name 10 people for child pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa no nahavita ny isa ambony indrindra tamin’ny taranja fivelesana, hazakazaka 70 amin’ny baolina 41 tamin’ny fivelesana efatra 11 sy enina 2 izy.
mt: Robin Uthappa was the highest scorer in the five-match series, scoring 70 in the first five-match, 41 in the second five-match, 11 in the third five-match and 2 in the fourth five-match.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Ireo batsmen eo afovoany, Sachin Tendulkar sy Rahul Dravid, dia nifanaraka tsara ary nanao fiaraha-miasa nahazoana isa zato.
mt: The two batsmen at the crease, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, were in good form and scored centuries.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Kanefa, rehefa very ny wicket an’ilay kapiteny dia tsy nahazo afa-tsy 36 isa i India, very wickets 7 tamin’ny faran’ny lalao.
mt: 36 runs was all India could manage, with 7 wickets down at the end of the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Tonga tany Singapour tamin’ny marainan’ny faha 16 Novambra ny Filoha Amerikana George W. Bush, hanomboka ny herinandrom-pitsidihana an’i Asia.
mt: 16 November, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore to begin his Asian tour.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Noraisin'ny Praiministra Lefitra Wong Kan Seng izy ary niresaka varotra sy olan’ny asa fampihorohoroana niaraka tamin’ny Praiministr'i Singapaoro Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was accompanied by Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and his wife, Ho Ching.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Taorian’ny herinandro fatiantoka nandritra ny fifidianana antenantenam-potoana dia niresaka momba ny fanitarana ny varotra any Azia tamin'ny mpanatrika i Bush.
mt: During the summit, Bush was asked about the Asian financial crisis by the president.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Ny Praiministra Stephen Harper dia nanaiky ny handefa ny “Lalàna Rivotra Madio” an’ny governemanta any amin’ny kaomity misy ny antoko rehetra mba hodinihina, alohan’ny hamakiana azy faharoa, aorian’ny fivoriana 25 minitra miaraka amin’ny mpitarika ny NDP Jack Layton ao amin’ny PMO ny Talata.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to the “bloodless coup” by the government of all parties to prevent a second vote, after the victory of 25 ministers with the NDP Jack Layton in the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: I Layton dia nangataka ny hanovana ny volavolandalàna nataon’ny mpandala ny nentin-drazana momba ny tontolo iainana nandritra ny fihaonana tamin’ny Praiministra, nangataka ny “hamerenana ny famolavolana feno sy tanteraka” ny volavolandalàna momba ny tontolo iainana nataon’ny antoko mpandala ny nentin-drazana.
mt: Layton called for the removal of the "inflammatory" statements made by the party that released the poll.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Hatramin’izay nidiran’ny Governemanta Federaly an-tsehatra hamatsy vola ny hopitaly Mersey ao Devonport, Tasmania, dia nokianin’ny governemanta-panjakana sy depiote federaly ho toy ny dokambarotra izany mialoha ny fifidianana federaly amin’ny Novambra.
mt: The Federal Government has committed $1.5 million to the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, with the federal government and the Tasmanian government agreeing to match the federal funding for the November federal election.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Saingy nanambara ny Praiminisitra John Howard fa ny lalàna dia tsy nikendry afa-tsy ny hiarovana ny fotodrafitrasan’ny hopitaly mba tsy hanenan’ny governemantan’i Tasmania ny lanjany, amin’ny fanomezana 45 tapitrisa dolara aostralianina fanampiny.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said the legislation was not intended to prevent the hospital from closing, but to ensure the government of Tasmania did not abandon it, with a $45 million Australian dollar subsidy.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Araka ny vaovao farany, ny famakiana ny haavon’ny ranomasina dia nanambara fa nisy tsunami niforona. Nisy trangana tsunami hita mazava voarakitra tao akaikin'i Pago Pago sy Niue.
mt: According to the latest reports, the tsunami warning was issued after a tsunami was generated. A tsunami was observed as far away as Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tsy nisy ny fahasimbana be na ny olona naratra tao Tonga raha ny tatitra, fa tsy nandeha vetivety ny herinaratra, izay voalaza ho nahatonga ny manampahefana avy ao Tonga tsy naharay ny fampitandremana tsunami nataon’ny PTWC.
mt: There were no reports of damage or injuries in Tonga as the tsunami hit, which the PTWC said was caused by the earthquake.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Sekoly miisa efatra ambin’ny folo ao Hawaii miorina eny amorontsiraka na eny akaikiny no nakatona ny Alarobia tontolo na dia efa nesorina aza ny filazana loza.
mt: 10 schools in Hawaii have been evacuated in both directions after reports of a bomb.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Nankasitraka ny fanambarana ny Filoha Amerikanina George W. Bush.
mt: 2008 Presidential Inauguration
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Ny mpitondra tenin’i Bush, Gordon Johndroe, dia namaritra ny fianianan'i Korea Avaratra ho “dingana mavesa-danja ho any amin’ny tanjona hanatanterahana ny fanalàna azo hamarinina ny fitaovampiadiana nokleary ao amin'ilay saikinosy lehibe koreanina”.
mt: North Korea's actions are "unprecedented" in terms of the threat they pose to the world, White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Ny tafio-drivotra nomena anarana faha-folo tamin’ny taon-drivodozan’ny Atlantika, rivodoza Storm Jerry, niforona tao amin’ny ranomasim-be ny Atlantika androany.
mt: 5th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Tropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean yesterday.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Nilaza ny Ivontoerana Nasionalin’ny Rivodoza (NHC) fa tsy atahorana i Jerry amin’izao fotoana izao.
mt: The National Hurricane Center says Jerry is not expected to strengthen.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Naminavina ny Sampan'ny Injeniera Amerikanina fa rotsakorana 6 pouces dia mety hamaky ireo digy efa simba teo aloha.
mt: 6-inch diameter pipes may have been damaged in the blast.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ny Ninth Ward (Fizaram-paritany Fahasivy) izay nahita tondradrano avo hatrany amin’ny 20 feet tany nandritra ny rivodoza Katrina, dia feno rano hatreo am-balahany amin'izao satria nitobaka ny fefiloha teo akaiky teo.
mt: 20 feet of water flooded the Ninth Ward (Flooded Ward) during Hurricane Katrina, and now the neighborhood is flooded again because the levees broke nearby.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Misy rano miparitaka eo ambon’ny fefiloha mameno faritra 100 feet.
mt: 100-foot area around the crash site is contaminated with fuel.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Naneho ny fahasorenany manoloana ireo fanafoanana i Adam Cuerden, Mpandrindra ny Commons, tamin’izy nitafa tamin’ny Wikinews ny volana lasa teo.
mt: Adam Cuerden, Commons Custodian, has been awarded the Wikinews 2013 Barnstar for his work on the site.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “Efa nandainga tamintsika hatramin’ny voalohany izy [i Wales]. Voalohany, dia mody nataony toy ny resaka ara-dalàna ilay izy. Faharoa, dia mody nihaino antsika izy, mandra-pamafa ilay artikla.”
mt: “He’s been in Wales for a while now. First, he was just a legal resident. Second, he was just a visitor, he just wrote the article.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Ny fahatezeran’ny mponina no nitarika ny ezaka rehetra amin’izao fotoana izao mba hanoratana politika mikasika ny votoaty ara-nofo ho an’ilay tranonkala mampiantrano haino vaky jery an-tapitrisany manana fahazoan-dalana malalaka.
mt: The population's anger has led to the destruction of all the buildings in the area to protest the government's decision to build a prison with a capacity of 1,000 inmates.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Teorika ny asa vita tamin’ny ankapobeny, fa nosoratana ilay programa mba hanaovana sarisary ny fandinihana ny vahindanitra Sagittaire.
mt: The program is believed to have been designed to provide a replacement for the aging Sagittaire.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Mety avy amin’ny herin’ny samonta eo amin’ny matière noire an’ny Vahindanitra sy ny matière noire an’ny Làlana Mandronono ny vokatra nandrandrain’ny ekipa.
mt: It may be due to the collision of the black matter of the Vahindra and the black matter of the Mandronono River the team’s results.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Tahaka ny volana izay mampihatra hery misintona amin’ny tany izay mahatonga onja, dia tahaka izany koa ny Vahindanitra Mivolondronono dia mampihatra hery amin’ny vahindanitra Sagittarius.
mt: As the sun moves closer to the Earth, it also moves closer to the constellation Sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Nahavita nanatsoaka hevitra ireo siantifika fa ny fiantraikan'ny raha mainty (matière noire) amin'ny raha mainty hafa dia mitovy amin'ny fiantraikan'ny raha mahazatra ihany.
mt: Scientists say that the carbon in carbon nanotubes is similar to the carbon in graphite.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Ity teoria ity dia milaza fa ny ankamaroan’ny zavatra mainty manodidina ny vahindanitra dia mipetraka manodidina ny vahindanitra toy ny karazana tara-pahazavana, izay vita amin’ny singa madinika be dia be.
mt: This theory states that most of the objects orbiting the Sun are orbiting the Sun like the planets, which are made of solid matter.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Nisy horonan-tsary fanadihadiana tamin’ny fahitalavitra nampiseho setroka fotsy nivoaka avy amin’ilay orinasa.
mt: The company has been criticized for releasing toxic waste into the environment.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Mampitandrina ny mponina mipetraka manodidina ny orinasa ny manam-pahefana eny an-toerana mba tsy hivoaka ny trano, hamono ny climatiseur ary tsy hisotro ny rano amin’ny paompy.
mt: Residents near the factory are being evacuated to prevent the spread of the fire, which is threatening to engulf the building, and to prevent the water supply from being contaminated.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Araka ny masoivoho nokleary japoney, hita tao amin’ilay ozinina ny cesium sy iode radioaktifa.
mt: According to nuclear watchdogs, traces of cesium and radioactive iodine were found in the water.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Mihevitra ireo manampahefana fa mety vaky ireo kaontenera nisy solika oranioma teo an-toerana ary nitete.
mt: Some observers believe that the containers may have been filled with orange juice and were leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Hitan’ny Dr. Tony Moll tany amin’ny faritra Atsimon’i Afrika, KwaZulu-Nataldia, ilay Raboka Faran’izay Manohitra Fanafody (XDR-TB).
mt: Dr. Tony Moll in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, where the XDR-TB strain is spreading.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Tao anatin’ny valan-dresaka, nilaza izy fa ny karazany hafa dia tahaka ny “manakorontana sy mampiahiahy nohon’ny habehan’ny tahan’ny fahafatesana.”
mt: “It’s like a race against death,” he said.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Tao amin’ilay hopitaly angamba no nahazoan’ireo marary sasany parasy, hoy ny Dokotera Moll, ary mpiasan’ny hopitaly roa farafahakeliny no tratra.
mt: 12 of the 14 patients were admitted to the hospital, said Dr. Moll, and the other two were treated at two other hospitals.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
